Player History
Signed as a free agent by New York (M) on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $1,408,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/4/1985, off Storm Davis (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/7/1985, off Pascual Perez (ATL)...
Injured on 5/4/1986 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Won World Series with New York (M) in 1986...
Signed as a free agent by New York (Y) on 2/11/1988 to a 4-year deal worth $3,250,000 per year...
Won Gold Glove Award at Shortstop in 1988...
Injured on 3/26/1991 with a Ruptured Achilles Tendon, out for full season...
